Given the rapid pace of global environmental change, proficiency in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) is becoming a highly sought-after skillset within and beyond academia.Especially cross-disciplinary knowledge sharing in cutting-edge techniques has high relevance to address environmental challenges. ## Research & Innovation Researchers and students will have the opportunity to present and discuss their applications of GIS and RS in addressing environmental challenges to real-word problems, while also exploring broader applications and potential innovations in the field. The seminars will be open to all and will encourage presenters to tailor their content for an interdisciplinary audience.
## Be Inspired... Connect with researchers and students from a wide range of disciplines across the globe. Gain valuable insights, share knowledge, and explore innovative GIS/RS techniques through cross-disciplinary dialogue‚Äîempowering change in a rapidly evolving world. ## Get Involved! Whether you're an experienced researcher or just starting with GIS/RS, join us to explore the latest methods and applications in landscape analysis. ```{=html}
Send your presentation idea to us!
